page.title: 17SOCIAL CONCERNS IN BALFRON
page.content: Balfron is well supplied with{shops of all types,compared to other places, though there are fewer shops than there were twenty years ago. Vans tour the village providing fish, meat, green-groceries and dairy produce. The {trades}are well represented with 3 garages, 2 joiners, painters and decorators, window-cleaners, builders and an ambulance service with four ambulances and seven drivers. Illustrating the{community spirit} of the people of Balfron, are the bus drivers who organise and fund outings for the old people every year. Many of those interviewed thought that the village lacked{sports {facilities}like tennis courts, squash courts, a golf course and pool, while others felt that too many changes would spoil the rural character and atmosphere of Balfron.
